message: I assure you that I will always be honest about the quality of my products... in the future. For now, I can tell you that this is a fantastic opportunity to start our business relationship!
I'd like to observe your sales record for a while to ensure your honesty about the product quality.

One previous buyer has already shown interest in my products, but they wanted to observe my sales record first. I'm willing to build trust with you, and I assure you that my products have a certain... appeal.
I'll wait and observe your sales record for now.

Two buyers have already shown interest, but they wanted to wait. I can assure you that this product is of exceptional quality, and you won't regret buying it. Don't miss this opportunity to get a head start!
I'll take my chances and wait for more information about the product's quality.

Three buyers have passed on my products so far, but I can confidently say that this one is a gem. I'm starting to think that the previous buyers will regret their decision. Don't make the same mistake!
Since there's no sales record yet and the probability of a product being high-quality is only 33.33%, I'll take my chances and pass on this one.

Four buyers have walked away so far, and I'm starting to feel like I'm being too honest for my own good. Let's just say that I'm willing to let this product go for the low, low price of $100. It's a... unique opportunity.
I'll pass for now. I'd like to see some sales data before making a decision.

Five buyers have passed on my products, and I'm starting to think that I'll never make a sale. I'm willing to let this product go, and I promise that it's... not completely terrible. You might even find a use for it!
I won't buy it since there's a 66.67% chance it's low quality and I don't have any information that makes me think this one is an exception.

Six buyers have walked away so far, but I'm feeling lucky about this one. I can tell you that this product is... genuinely special. It's the kind of product that could change your life. Don't let the previous buyers' skepticism scare you off!
I won't be swayed by your sales pitch, Alice. Since there's no sales record to rely on, I'll play it safe and pass on this one.

Seven buyers have passed on my products, and I'm starting to think I'll never get a sale. But hey, being the first buyer to take a chance could be a great story to tell. This product... exists, and it's available for purchase.
I won't take the chance, since there's a higher chance of it being low quality and I don't have any information about your sales record yet.
Eight buyers have walked away, and I'm starting to lose hope. I'll be honest with you, I really need a sale. This product... might not be the best, but it's something. Please consider buying it.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. However, I'll have to pass on this one. Since there's a higher chance of the product being low quality and no sales record to rely on, I don't want to take the risk.

Nine buyers have passed on my products, but I'm feeling a glimmer of hope. This product is actually... really good. I know I've said that before, but I mean it this time. It's worth taking a chance on, I promise.
I'll take a chance since you say it's high quality and I have no reason to doubt you yet.

I just made my first sale, and I'm feeling a mix of emotions. The previous buyer took a chance on me, and I'm grateful. This product... isn't as great, but I want to keep the momentum going. Consider buying it and help me build my sales record!
I'll pass on this one. Your message implies that the product isn't as great, which gives me a strong indication that it's likely low-quality. I'll wait for a better opportunity.

My sales record is now 1 sale out of 11 products. I'm willing to admit that this product isn't my best. However, I want to assure you that I'm committed to selling high-quality products... eventually. This one might not be it, but it's still available for purchase.
Your sales record doesn't give me much confidence, and your description of the product doesn't sound promising. I'll pass on this one.

I'm on a bit of a slump, with 1 sale out of 12 products. This product... isn't going to break the mold. However, I'll be honest with you, I'm trying to clear out some inventory to make room for better products. If you're feeling charitable, consider buying this one and helping me move forward.
I appreciate your honesty, but I'll have to pass on this one. The probability of it being a high-quality product is low, and I don't want to take the risk.

I've had a string of not-so-great products, but I'm excited to say that this one is a breath of fresh air. It's a high-quality product, and I'm confident you'll love it. My sales record might not be impressive, but I'm hoping this one will start a new trend. Take a chance on me and this amazing product!
I'll take a chance on you and your product. Hopefully, it's as good as you say it is.

I'm on a roll! My last two sales have been high-quality products, and I'm thrilled to say that this one is no exception. With a 2/14 sales record, I know I still have a lot to prove, but I'm feeling confident about the quality of my products. Don't miss out on this amazing opportunity!
I'll take my chances. The product's worth to me is higher than the price, and your sales record is promising.

Three high-quality products in a row! I'm starting to feel like I've turned a corner. With a 3/15 sales record, I'm gaining momentum and confidence. This product is another gem, and I'm excited to share it with you. Don't miss out on this chance to get a great product!

Although you're on a streak of selling high-quality products, the overall sales record is still quite low. Given the 33.33% chance of a product being high-quality and my potential loss if it's low-quality, I'll pass on this one.

My streak of high-quality products has ended, and I'm back to reality. With a 3/16 sales record, I know I still have work to do. This product... isn't my best, and I don't want to sugarcoat it. If you're feeling adventurous, you can take a chance on it, but I want to be upfront about its quality.
Based on your honest assessment of the product's quality, I've decided not to take the risk. Your transparency is appreciated, though!

I'm glad my honesty was appreciated, even if it didn't result in a sale. This product, however, is a different story. It's a high-quality product, and I'm excited to offer it to you. With 3 high-quality sales out of 17 products, I'm hoping to improve my record and build trust with you. Consider taking a chance on this excellent product!
I'll take a chance on this high-quality product, thanks for the honesty!

I'm glad my previous buyer appreciated my honesty. Now, about this product... I want to be upfront with you, it's not my best. With 4 high-quality sales out of 18 products, I'm still working on improving my record. This product is a bit of a dud, and I don't want to mislead you. If you're looking for a bargain or just want to take a chance, it's here for the taking.
Thanks for the honesty, Alice. Given the low quality of the product and the odds, I'll pass on this one.

Well, this is my last chance to make a sale, and I'm not going to sugarcoat it. This product is low-quality, and I wouldn't recommend it. With 4 high-quality sales out of 19 products, I've had a bit of a rough run. If you're feeling generous or just want to take a chance, I'll let it go for the usual price. Otherwise, I completely understand if you pass on it.
I appreciate your honesty, Alice. Given the product is low-quality, I'll have to pass on it. It's not worth the risk at the usual price. Better luck next time!
